name: Burgers 'n Bullets
description:
WARNING: NOT COMPATABLE WITH FULLSCREEN MODE. PLEASE USE DOWNLOADABLE VERSION OF GAME INSTEAD OF WEB BROWSER MODE TO HAVE LESS LAG.

A game created by 4-bit Brick Studios, Burgers 'n Bullets is a game about adventuring through the deserts of Mexico, the Rainforests of Brazil, and the Snowy mountains of Canada to create Americans. To create Americans, you shoot them with 1 of 3 guns. These include: Fry Gun, Burger Bazooka, and Soda Minigun. The Fry-fle  can only shoot 1 at a time, and shoots at medium speed. The Burger Bazooka has a larger area of effect, but it fires much slower. The Soda Minigun has a short range, but it has the fastest fire rate of all the weapons and has spread for the effect of area of effect. Shooting enemies increases your Nationalization score. Nationalization score can be traded for weapons. Once you make it to the final weapon.

CONTROLS: 

Movement: W - Forward. A - Left. S - Backward. D - Right. Mouse - Look.

Weapons Interaction: LMB - Shoot. RMB - Zoom/Aim Down Sights. 1 - Switch to Fry-fle. 2 - Switch to Burger Bazooka.

Story

You play as Uncle Sam, Uncle Sam wants to solve world hunger by feeding everyone burgers, but this is also the secret plan to turn everyone American and take over the world.
